String.string: Speak with Meren in Highwatch and gather information about the Supplier.

Go to Tamarang and investigate Nimotz's Pegasus log.

[Press key to open inventory and right-click Island of Dawn Teleport Scroll to use.]
There is luggage lying scattered on the ground. Those likely belong to Nimotz.
Find Nimotz's belongings near the Dock.
Search Nimotz's belongings for clues to his whereabouts.
There is a note in Nimotz's belongings. You see the words 'Northern Overwatch.'
Find Nimotz in the Northern Overwatch area of the Island of Dawn.

Gather the materials and deliver them to Nimotz.
[Press key to open inventory and right-click the Personal Teleport Scroll: Nimotz.]
Use the Earth Stone to empower the Eternal Crown. [Press key to open inventory and right-click the Earth Stone.]
